morphInfos.tenseExplained: it will happen in the future
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does to oneself or for oneself
morphInfos.moodExplained: saying that an action actually happens
morphInfos.personExplained: they are the one being spoken or written to
morphInfos.numberExplained: there is only one of them
morphInfos.explanation: an action that will happen to or for a person being spoken or written to
